text:
Uh I’ll make an Aioli:

- 1 egg yolk
- whisk with crushed clove or two of garlic, 1/2 tsp of mustard powder, 1/2 tsp salt
- keep whisking and slowly add 1-1 1/4c of light olive oil until it emulsifies and is the consistency you want
- whisk in the juice of half a lime (or lemon, but i think shishitos are better with lime)

then I’ll add like 1/2c of goat cheese:
- Add 1/2c goat crumbled cheese

then stir it up, i like to keep the goat cheese a bit crumbly for texture but ymmv
the aioli will keep for as long as your eggs will (maybe a little longer) so you can take out what you need and add cheese to taste and keep the rest around for lime-y blts

attachments.title: The Never Seen Episode of Iron Chef: America
attachments.text: Based on a story we all wish would happen... The following episode of Iron Chef America was not aired due to how brutally one sided the showdown was. The challenging chef was never heard from again...
attachments.fallback: Random Encounterz: The Never Seen Episode of Iron Chef: America
